---
title: VFS GLOBAL
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: vfs_global
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $39.3M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with VFS GLOBAL. The average
  contract duration was 5.45 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $31.0M.
  The longest contract was 7 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $108.4M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '39.3M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '11'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '11'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '100%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '435%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1.91'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '241.5M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '5.45'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '31.0M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '7'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '108.4M'
---
